did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor- Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Includes photos of national political figures, labor leaders and workers including many women workers in clothing and other industries, immigration, war effort, political work, union label campaigns, health care, child care, education, housing, clothing imports, organized by name and subject

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Includes photos of national political figures, labor leaders and workers including many women workers in clothing and other industries, immigration, war effort, political work, union label campaigns, health care, child care, education, housing, clothing imports, organized by name and subject

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Amalgamated Clothing and Textile Workers Union-- Archives

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: ACWA Photographs #5743 P. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
